name: Normal Fd
details: If you want to deposit your funds in a fixed term deposit that attract superior returns in a specific period of time, People’s Bank term deposits are the ideal solution maturity terms of deposits range from 1 month, 3 months, 06 months, 12 months, 24 months, 36 months, 48 months & 60 months. If you are a Sri Lankan over 18 years of age, you can open an individual or joint term deposit with a minimum deposit of Rs. 5,000/- Special benefits Special benefits: A renewal notice will be sent and you at the time of renewal. The bank will consider the balance of the fixed deposit account when considerate customer value. You can obtain a cash margin loan on the balance of the account.
